Module com.narayanjoshi.gplapplication
Package com.narayanjoshi.gplapplication.service

Interface RootCommandIfc

All Known Implementing Classes:
CircleCommand, ClearCommand, CommentCommand, DrawToCommand, FillCommand, MoveToCommand, PenCommand, ReadFromFileCommand, RectangleCommand, ResetCommand, RootCommand, SaveToFileCommand, TriangleCommand
public interface RootCommandIfc
The RootCommandIfc interface represents generic method required for drawing.
Since:
v1.0
Author:
Narayan Joshi

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    draw(String command)
    This method is responsible to perform draw operation of all types of shapes and command process.
    void
    init(CanvasUtil canvasUtil, CommandEnum commandEnum)
    This method is responsible to initialization all the instance, command and param which are required to draw a shape or process all type of instruction provided by user input.
    void
    validate(String inputCommand)
    This method validate user input command and parameter with system defined command and parameter.

  • Method Details

    • init

      void init(CanvasUtil canvasUtil, CommandEnum commandEnum)
      This method is responsible to initialization all the instance, command and param which are required to draw a shape or process all type of instruction provided by user input.
      Parameters:
      canvasUtil - holds all requirement information for processing CanvasUtil
      commandEnum - holds all the process instance information as per the provided command

    • draw

      void draw(String command)
      This method is responsible to perform draw operation of all types of shapes and command process.
      Parameters:
      command - represent the user input instruction with consist of command and param
      See Also:
      • for command syntax

    • validate

      void validate(String inputCommand)
      This method validate user input command and parameter with system defined command and parameter.
      Parameters:
      inputCommand - represent the user input instruction with consist of command and param
